channel.title: Problems logging in
channel.description: I recently joined a server, when i tryed to log in it told me You have been ip banned please try again in 5 minutes, i spoke with the admin, he told me to reset my laptop and re download the client, i done this but it still says Ip banned, can anyone help with this ? thanks,

item.title: Problems logging in
item.dc:creator: @stego stego
item.description:
@stego wrote:

i wasnt banned lol, i just found out about the client tryed to log in and that came up, il have words with the owner, thanks for the help guys

Read full topic

item.title: Problems logging in
item.dc:creator: @frostscapeserver frostscapeserver
item.description:
@frostscapeserver wrote:

Okay if it says you’re IP banned its not you…its them. There’s no other way you would be IP banned unless your account is only just banned.

Read full topic

item.title: Problems logging in
item.dc:creator: @stego stego
item.description:
@stego wrote:

he did remove me but when i tryed to log in it said the same again…

Read full topic

item.title: Problems logging in
item.dc:creator: @short_asian_kid short_asian_kid
item.description:
@short_asian_kid wrote:

Your computer doese not have a dynamic ip, so you will have to ask the owner to remove you from the ip ban list.

Read full topic

I recently joined a server,
when i tryed to log in it told me You have been ip banned please try again in 5 minutes, i spoke with the admin, he told me to reset my laptop and re download the client, i done this but it still says Ip banned, can anyone help with this ?
thanks,
